model.name: Damier Azur Jogging Pants
model.disambiguatingDescription: A timeless pair of jogging pants reimagined as a silky signature statement. Crafted from soft, lightweight satin in an allover print of the iconic Damier Azur motif. An elasticated waistband and contrasting ribbed ankles underscore the comfortable, sporty style, while brass hardware adds a metallic accent to the pockets and drawstring.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 71% Acetate, 29% Viscose
  • Other Material : 70% Silk, 28% Polyamide, 2% Elastane
  • Lining : 53% Viscose, 47% Cupro
  • Off-White
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 30'' / 76 cm, Height 5' 9" / 175 cm, Waist 22'' / 56 cm, Hips 35'' / 88cm
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
